Reviews.Title: “Ibis - No frills done well.”
Reviews.Author: minibreak_hero
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 friends amsterdam hen weekend reasonably priced centrally located selected city stopera ibis central station reading reviews trip advisor noise hens nights sleep extremely impressed ibis ive stayed ibis hotels am nononsense quality notch flat screen tv tidy clean bed comfy duvet fluffy curtains blacked ounce lying hard nights partying hotel quiet werent frequently woken late night doorslamming talking corridors true town centre budget hotels shower cubicle roomy wet shower powerful plenty hot water hairdryer wasnt powerful wired bathroom wasnt convenient dry hair friend shower glad brought own shower gel shower cap provided impressed ibis using ecofriendly shower gel towels looked fluffy soft staff friendly helpful allowed check late afternoon sat hotel bar couple lagers chill bar staff brought try meat 3 explained vegetarian special meat free ones nice touch hotel reception taxi night reasonably priced helpful bar tastefully decorated nice atmosphere tables decorated candles flowers buzz hotel bar doesnt usually word warning extremely expensive 11 euros brandy diet coke hotel conveniently located near waterlooplein able buses didnt try breakfast found excellent bagel shop round corner called tonys bagel coffee 7 euro tasty hotel check 12 appreciated extra hour bed hotels check 11 5 agreement stay hotel future visits brilliant city im wont half fun hen weekend

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable and in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Tillard
Reviews.Content: looking clean comfortable hotel quiet easy walking distance centre amsterdam hotel ideal reasonable size bathroom little nevertheless perfectly functional immaculately kept staff friendly helpful breakfast particularly wide choice hot cold food available decent hotels cities tend expensive ibis stopera reasonable comparison similar hotels amsterdam mentioned travellers 1 aware teacoffee machine consider bringing own travel kettle 2 canal view quieter picturesque overall hotel choice recommended
